definition: select the best people for promotion
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: He has just been promoted to vice-general manager.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚被拔擢为副总经理。

sentences.english: She performed sexual favors for her boss to get promoted. ;
sentences.chinese: 她对老板牺牲色相以获得拔擢。

sentences.english: They, perhaps more than others, are determined to build a wiser world.
sentences.chinese: 他们大概比任何人皆果断天要拔擢一个更聪慧的天下。

definition: to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
to break the rule/to make an exception
to put in an important position
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
to be involved in politics/participation in politics
to set apart/to assign sb to a job
